page.title: 05HOME FARM LT.WALTHAM
page.content: The majority of the land in our area is farmland. Much of the farmland is devoted to crops such as{Wheat, {Barley, Corn and Oil seed rape.}A particular farm had three workers to manage eight hundred and forty five acres. { Oil seed rape}is sprayed towards the end of July and is harvested at the end of September.{Wheat and Barley}are harvested between the end of September and October, no later. The average field is about twenty acres. A{Spray, {Combine Harvester, Mineral Spreader, {Drill}and{Plough}are some of the items a farmer uses. One of the main problems is the {Pollen Beetle}which diseases the oil seed rape. If the plant has more than fifteen beetles on it then the farmer sprays it with an insecticide.
